segment.source: Sign code integrity policy with Device Guard signing (Windows 10)
segment.target: Sign code integrity policy with Device Guard signing (Windows 10)

segment.source: Signing code integrity policies prevents policies from being tampered with after they're deployed.
segment.target: Signing code integrity policies prevents policies from being tampered with after they're deployed.

segment.source: You can sign code integrity policies with the Device Guard signing portal.
segment.target: You can sign code integrity policies with the Device Guard signing portal.

segment.source: Sign code integrity policy with Device Guard signing
segment.target: Sign code integrity policy with Device Guard signing

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 10 Mobile
segment.target: Windows 10 Mobile

segment.source: Signing code integrity policies prevents policies from being tampered with after they're deployed.
segment.target: Signing code integrity policies prevents policies from being tampered with after they're deployed.

segment.source: You can sign code integrity policies with the Device Guard signing portal.
segment.target: You can sign code integrity policies with the Device Guard signing portal.

segment.source: Sign your code integrity policy
segment.target: Sign your code integrity policy

segment.source: Before you get started, be sure to review these best practices:
segment.target: Before you get started, be sure to review these best practices:

segment.source: Best practices
segment.target: Best practices

segment.source: Test your code integrity policies on a group of devices before deploying them to a large group of devices.
segment.target: Test your code integrity policies on a group of devices before deploying them to a large group of devices.

segment.source: Use rule options 9 and 10 during testing.
segment.target: Use rule options 9 and 10 during testing.

segment.source: For more information, see the section Code integrity policy rules in the Device Guard deployment guide.
segment.target: For more information, see the section Code integrity policy rules in the Device Guard deployment guide.

segment.source: To sign a code integrity policy
segment.target: To sign a code integrity policy

segment.source: Sign in to the Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Sign in to the Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Click Settings, and then choose Device Guard signing.
segment.target: Click Settings, and then choose Device Guard signing.

segment.source: Click Upload to upload your code integrity policy.
segment.target: Click Upload to upload your code integrity policy.

segment.source: After the files are uploaded, click Sign to sign the code integrity policy.
segment.target: After the files are uploaded, click Sign to sign the code integrity policy.

segment.source: Click Download to download the signed code integrity policy.
segment.target: Click Download to download the signed code integrity policy.

segment.source: When you sign a code integrity policy with the Device Guard signing portal, the signing certificate is added to the policy.
segment.target: When you sign a code integrity policy with the Device Guard signing portal, the signing certificate is added to the policy.

segment.source: This means you can't modify this policy.
segment.target: This means you can't modify this policy.

segment.source: If you need to make changes, make them to an unsigned version of the policy, and then resign the policy.
segment.target: If you need to make changes, make them to an unsigned version of the policy, and then resign the policy.
